v8:item.v8:content: Documents according to the invoice for payment

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Posted THEN CASE WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0 AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentInvoiceForPayment.SchedulePayment AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentInvoiceForPayment.SchedulePayment AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Ref, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.DeletionMark, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Number, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Date, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Posted, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Company, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Comment, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.BasisDocument, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Counterparty, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Contract, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.CashAssetsType, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.BankAccount, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.DocumentCurrency, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Multiplicity, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.ExchangeRate, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.CounterpartyPriceKind, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.DocumentAmount, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.PettyCash, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Responsible, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.PointInTime, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Author, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.IncomingDocumentNumber, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.IncomingDocumentDate, CASE WHEN DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Posted AND DocumentInvoiceForPayment.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0)) * 100 / DocumentInvoiceForPayment.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS PaymentAmountTurnover, DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Department FROM Document.SupplierInvoiceForPayment AS DocumentInvoiceForPayment LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentFact AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentInvoiceForPayment.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)}
